CREATE PROCEDURE dwh.empty_staging_tables
AS BEGIN
    DELETE FROM dwh_staging.jira_git_fact;
    DELETE FROM dwh_staging.developer_dimension;
    DELETE FROM dwh_staging.project_dimension;
END
GO

-- LOAD CORE DEVELOPER 

CREATE PROCEDURE dwh.load_core_developer
AS
BEGIN
    SET NOCOUNT ON;
    INSERT INTO dwh_core.developer_dimension (
        [DeveloperKey],
        [DeveloperName],
        [DeveloperRole]
    )
    SELECT
        [DeveloperKey],
        [DeveloperName],
        [DeveloperRole]
    FROM
        dwh_staging.developer_dimension;
END;
GO

-- LOAD DWH CORE PROJECT
CREATE PROCEDURE dwh.load_core_project
AS
BEGIN
    SET NOCOUNT ON;

    INSERT INTO dwh_core.project_dimension (
        [ProjectKey],
        [ProjectName],
        [ProjectStart],
        [ProjectEnd],
        [RevenueGenerated]
    )
    SELECT
        [ProjectKey],
        [ProjectName],
        CAST([ProjectStart] AS DATETIME) AS [ProjectStart], 
        CAST([ProjectEnd] AS DATETIME) AS [ProjectEnd],    
        [RevenueGenerated]
    FROM
        dwh_staging.project_dimension;
END;
GO

-- LOAD DWH JIRA GIT FACT
CREATE PROCEDURE dwh.load_core_jira_git
AS
BEGIN
    SET NOCOUNT ON;

    -- Insert data into core table from staging table
    INSERT INTO dwh_core.jira_git_fact (
        [JiraGitKey],
        [JiraTicketKey],
        [DeveloperKey],
        [StoryPoint],
        [GitHubRepo],
        [CommitMessage],
        [CommitTime],
        [ProjectName]
    )
    SELECT
        [JiraGitKey],
        [JiraTicketKey],
        [DeveloperKey],
        [StoryPoint],
        [GitHubRepo],
        [CommitMessage],
        CAST([CommitTime] AS DATETIME), -- Cast the date column to datetime
        [ProjectName]
    FROM
        dwh_staging.jira_git_fact;
END;
GO
